name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance **full-stack solutions** with an emphasis on **cloud-based applications**. Expert in **Python** and **PHP**, employing modern frameworks and technologies to create impactful software solutions. Proven track record of leading project delivery teams while maintaining high standards of code quality through **code review** and **design document review** processes. Proficient in **AI tooling**, leveraging advanced technologies to enhance applications with AI/ML capabilities.

Demonstrated ability to mentor junior developers and guide them through complex project challenges. Skilled in building secure and compliant applications, focusing on industry standards and regulations, including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in developing scalable architectures and fostering collaboration across teams to achieve strategic goals.
